content.p: For each of the following, decide whether or not the statement represents a way to transport oxygen.

question.body: Oxygen binds to the iron in the hemoglobin.

response.feedback: Correct. Iron is able to react with oxygen. This is why iron rusts.
Incorrect.Iron reacts with oxygen. This is why iron rusts.

question.body: Four oxygens binds to one hemoglobin.

response.feedback: Correct. Hemoglobin contains four heme subunits, which are each able to bind one oxygen at which point it is fully saturated.
Incorrect. Hemoglobin contains four heme subunits, which are each able to bind one oxygen.
